Executive Summary: TR Marketing is leveraging AI to enhance customer growth through improved segmentation. Despite challenges in data management and project delays, significant progress has been made. The focus is now on testing and activating these segments to optimize marketing efforts.
Key Risks and Issues:
Data Inconsistencies: Inconsistent customer definitions and complex data access hinder progress.
Operational Delays: Lengthy data access processes affecting nimbleness.
Progress on Use Case this period:
Customer Segmentation: Finalized segments and shared lessons learned.
Microsoft Copilot License Expansion: Reallocation in progress to meet increased demand.
Details on Change Management:
Current Initiatives: Building a centralized data solution and improving data access workflows.
Future Plans: Establishing a cross-functional program to support growth and revenue goals for 2027, focusing on customer integration and data management.
Path Forward:
Activate Customer Segmentation: Implement campaigns for prioritized segments within 60 days.
Streamline Data Processes: Centralize data management to improve efficiency.
